This app used to work properly. But it stopped working properly after I upgraded from AdGuard 3.x to AdGuard 4.x > > The app has following issues when AdGuard is enabled: > > - Embedded videos don't play (or sometimes play after 3-5 minutes of waiting). They usually embed Youtube videos. > - The news (main) page doesn't load. Keep getting the "Couldn't fetch news. Please try again" error (screenshot). If I click on "Try Again" link 3-7 times, it eventually load even with AdGuard enabled. > - This app also has an embedded browser shows news articles from news sources.
